mxywh.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual mxywh.h(7)

NAME

mxywh.h — rectangle data structure

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <mxywh.h>

struct mjo_xywh {

ssize_t m_pos_x ;
ssize_t m_pos_y ;
size_t m_len_x ;
size_t m_len_y ;
};

INCLUDES

<mstddef.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides a rectangle data structure

struct mjo_xywh

m_pos_x x position
m_pos_y y position
m_len_x x length (width)
m_len_y y length (height)
July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
